name: Espresso Martini
description: A coffee-flavored cocktail with vodka and espresso.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Gin Basil Smash
description: A refreshing gin-based cocktail with basil and citrus.
instructions: Muddle basil leaves and simple syrup in a shaker.
Add gin and lemon juice, shake with ice.
Double strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Solero
instructions: Shake vodka, passion fruit juice, orange juice, and simple syrup with ice.
Strain into a glass filled with ice.
Top with a splash of soda water.

name: Caipirinha
description: A classic Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça and lime.
instructions: Cut lime into wedges and muddle with sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice and add cachaça.
Stir well and serve.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail with mint, lime, and rum.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum.
Fill the glass with ice and top with club soda.
Garnish with mint sprig and lime wedge.

name: Passion Fruit Mojito
description: A tropical twist on the classic mojito with passion fruit.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, passion fruit pulp, and simple syrup in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum.
Fill the glass with ice and top with club soda.
Garnish with mint sprig and passion fruit slice.

name: Ipanema
description: A non-alcoholic mocktail similar to a mojito.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a glass.
Add lime juice.
Fill the glass with ice and top with ginger beer.
Garnish with mint sprig and lime wedge.

name: Rum Sour
description: A sour cocktail made with rum, lemon, and sugar.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Gin Fizz
description: A bubbly gin-based cocktail with citrus and soda.
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
Strain into a glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
